verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609>. When the YY <WH3068> turned again <WH7725> <WH8800> the captivity <WH7870> of TZiyon <WH6726>, we were like them that dream <WH2492> <WH8802>.

Then was our mouth <WH6310> filled <WH4390> <WH8735> with laughter <WH7814>, and our tongue <WH3956> with singing <WH7440>: then said <WH559> <WH8799> they among the heathen <WH1471>, The YY <WH3068> hath done <WH6213> <WH8800> great things <WH1431> <WH8689> for them.
The YY <WH3068> hath done <WH6213> <WH8800> great things <WH1431> <WH8689> for us; whereof we are glad <WH8056>.
Turn again <WH7725> <WH8798> our captivity <WH7622> <WH8675> <WH7622>, O YY <WH3068>, as the streams <WH650> in the south <WH5045>.
They that sow <WH2232> <WH8802> in tears <WH1832> shall reap <WH7114> <WH8799> in joy <WH7440>.

He that goeth <WH3212> <WH8799> forth <WH1980> <WH8800> and weepeth <WH1058> <WH8800>, bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> precious <WH4901> seed <WH2233>, shall doubtless <WH935> <WH8800> come <WH935> <WH8799> again with rejoicing <WH7440>, bringing <WH5375> <WH8802> his sheaves <WH485> with him.
